255957.「ご機嫌うるわしゅう 大魔王さま！\n 本日も まばゆいばかりに\n 輝く笑顔で:
O Great Demon King! Your smile is as dazzling
as always～!

255958.「……うむうむっ！\n 日に日に 大魔王らしく ご成長なされて\n この カーロ:
...Yes, yes! You are becoming more of a Great
Demon King with each passing day, and I,
Carlow, am proud of you.

255959.「ちょうど ３人の魔王たちが\n 大魔王城へ 参集したところでございます。\n:
The three Demon Kings have just gathered here
at the Great Demon King's castle. Please make
your way to the throne.

255963.「大魔王さまに 忠誠を誓いたる ３魔王……\n ここに 集いましてございます！\:
The three Demon Kings who have sworn allegiance to Great Demon King are gathered here! Ladies and gentlemen, please raise your
heads.

255964.「……おっと 悪い 悪い。\n どうも お前が 大魔王だっていう気が\n まだ:
...Ah, sorry, sorry. It's just that it still
feels strange that you're the Great Demon
King.

255965.「ようやく それぞれの国が 落ち着いたので\n 大魔王城に 来ることができたよ。:
Finally, the countries have settled down and
we can come to the Great Demon King's castle.

255966.「魔界を 大魔瘴期から 救うことが\n ここに集った みんなの願いだ。\n 遠慮:
It is the wish of everyone gathered here to
save the Demon World from the Age of Miasma.
Please don't hesitate to rely on us.

255968.「当面の問題といえば……\n 魔仙卿のヤツの ことだな。:
Speaking of immediate problems... what about
the Oracle?

255969.「デモンマウンテンの頂から 魔界を見下ろして\n 代々の大魔王を選定し 何万年も:
From the top of Demon Mountain, overlooking the Demon World and selecting the Great Demon Kings for generations, the Oracle has served
the great source of darkness for thousands of years.

255970.「なにゆえ あやつが\n 魔界のすべてを 敵に回したのかは\n いまだ 謎のまま:
Why they have made enemies of the entire Demon
World remains a mystery.

255971.「かつて この魔界が\n アストルティアの 一部だったという\n 魔仙卿の言葉に:
I don't think the Oracle was lying when they
said that the Demon World was once a part of
Astoltia.

255972.「捨てられた大地である 魔界の民が抱く\n アストルティアへの復讐心……\n そ:
They asked if the people of Demon World, the land abandoned by the people of Astoltia, could ever let go of the vengeance they harbor
against Astoltia.

255973.「だが そのために 新たな大魔王として\n 君を選んだなら どうして\n あの場:
But if they chose you as the new Great Demon
King for that purpose, then why did they
suddenly decide to attack you?

255974.「……さあな。\n どういうつもりかは 魔仙卿を\n ふんづかまえて 直接 聞い:
...Who knows? We should just grab the Oracle
and ask them directly what they're planning.

255975.「戴冠式での言葉から 察するに\n 再び 俺たちの前に姿を現すつもりだろう。\n:
From what they said at the coronation, I'm guessing they're going to show their face to us again eventually. Let's stay alert and find
out where they're hiding.

255976.「だが その前に……\n 新たな大魔王サマに やってほしいことが\n あるんだ。:
But first... there's something I want the new
Great Demon King to do.

255977.「魔仙卿があやつる 魔瘴魂が\n 大魔王の戴冠式を 襲撃したってうわさは\n 魔:
Rumors have already spread throughout the Demon World that Evil Souls controlled by the Oracle attacked the Great Demon King at their
coronation ceremony.

255978.「ただでさえ 大魔瘴期の予感に\n おびえていたところへ 魔仙卿の裏切りだ。\n:
The people were already frightened by the
prospect of the Age of Miasma, and now the
Oracle's betrayal. The people are on edge.

255979.「そこで 新たな大魔王として 威厳を示し\n その 強さと心意気を 知らしめて\:
So, as the new Great Demon King, I would like you to show your dignity and reassure the people of Demon World of your strength and
spirit.

255980.「……確かに 現在の 大魔王では\n まだまだ 頼りなく見えるからな。:
...It's true that the current Great Demon King
still looks a bit unreliable.

255981.「大魔王さまの たのもしさ！\n 威厳！ かしこさ！ うつくしさは\n ワタクシ:
The Great Demon King's joy! Their majesty!
Their wisdom! Their beauty! I can feel all of
these things very well!

255982.「……が しかし 愚かなる魔界の民には\n 大魔王さまの すばらしさが\n 今ひ:
...But it is true that the ignorant masses of
the Demon World are not yet aware of the Great
Demon King's... greatness!

255983.「しばしの間 大魔王としての経験を積まれ\n 民心の掌握に努めるのも よろしいか:
It would be good for you to gain experience as
Great Demon King while winning the hearts and
minds of your people...

255984.「じゃ そういうことで がんばってくれよ。\n 大魔王サマ。:
Well then, good luck with that, Great Demon
King.

255985.「魔仙卿の捜索は\n 我がバルディスタに 任されよ。\n ……では 失礼する。:
Leave the search for the Oracle to Valdista.
Now, if you'll excuse me.

255986.「がんばってね 大魔王。\n ……君のこと 応援しているよ。:
Good luck, Great Demon King. I'm rooting for
you.

255987.「私のチカラが 必要になったら\n 部屋にいるから いつでも 来てね。: If you need my help, I'll be in my room.

255988.「……これにて 謁見終了！\n では 大魔王さま。今後の ご公務の詳細は\n ワ:
With this, your audience is over! Now, Great
Demon King. I will explain the details of your
official duties from now on.

255989.「さすがですぞ 大魔王さま！\n すっかり 大魔王らしさを 身につけられて。\n:
You are indeed the Great Demon King! You've completely acquired the character of a Great Demon King. I, Carlow, can't help but weep
tears of joy...

255990.「大魔王即位から 時を置かずして\n これほど多くの業績を 成しとげられるとは！:
I can't believe that so many accomplishments have been achieved in so little time since the accession to the throne of Great Demon King! I
must say, you have really worked hard.

255991.「ずっと 働きづめで いらしたのです。\n しばらくの間は この城で\n のんび:
You have been working hard all this time. For
now, you can relax in this castle and stretch
your legs...

255992.「なにごとだ！？\n 大魔王さまの 御前であるぞ！:
What is this!? You're in the presence of the
Great Demon King!

255996.「ご苦労！ よく しらせてくれた。\n お部屋にいらっしゃる イルーシャさまを\:
Good work! You have done well. Please summon
Lady Irusha from her room.

255997.「遠征軍駐屯所は 対アストルティアの最前線。\n かの地を 救ったとなれば\n:
Expedition Station is the front line against
Astoltia. If we saved that place, the Great
Demon King's prestige would be even greater!

255998.「お疲れのところ 申し訳ございませんが\n 魔瘴の巫女 イルーシャさまと ともに:
I'm sorry to ask you when you were about to relax, but please go with the Maiden of Miasma, Irusha, and rescue the garrison at the
Expedition Station!

255999.「おお！ お待ちしておりましたぞ！\n 魔瘴の巫女 イルーシャさま！\n じつは:
Oh! We've been expecting you! The Maiden of
Miasma, Irusha! We've been waiting for you for
some time now.

256000.「魔瘴が そんなに……！？: Is the demon miasma really that bad...!?

256001.「放っておいたら みんなの命が……。\n すぐに 助けにいきましょう！:
If we don't do something, all those lives will
be at risk... Let's go help them now!

256002.「おお イルーシャさま……！\n なんと おやさしい お言葉！: Oh, Irusha...! How kind of you to say that!

256003.「大魔王さま。イルーシャさまも\n こう おっしゃっておられます。\n どうか:
Great Demon King. Irusha has also asked of
you. Please, save that land.

256004.「遠征軍駐屯所は バルディア山岳地帯\n 南の 門の先にあります。\n ご武運を:
The Expedition Station is located at the South
Gate of the Valdia Mountain Region. We wish
you good luck!

256006.「これはこれは 大魔王様。\n ちょうどいい所へ おいでなすった！:
Well, well, well, if it isn't the Great Demon
King. You've come at a good time!

256007.「じつは どうしても アンタの耳に\n 入れときたいことが……おっと失礼。\n:
Actually, there's something I really wanted to
bend your ear for... oops, sorry. First, I'll
ask about your business here.

256008.「で 今日は どうしたんだ？\n うちの お嬢サマが 何かしでかしたかい？:
So, what's going on today? Did my little lady
do something wrong?

256009.<pc>は ベルトロに\n遠征軍駐屯所に 現れたという\n謎の集団が 来ていない:
<pc> asked Bertro if the
mysterious group of people from the Expedition
Station had shown up here!

256010.「そうそう！\n 俺も その話が したかったんだ！\n さすがは 大魔王様だねえ:
Oh yeah! That's what I wanted to talk about,
too! As expected of the Great Demon King～.

256011.「そうとも。お探しの フードの集団なら\n 確かに ここ バルディスタに 現れた:
Exactly. The group of hoods you're looking for
did indeed show up here in Valdista.

256012.「……魔王ヴァレリアを 探しに……な。: ...they were looking for Demon King Valeria.

256014.「ヴァレリアが 大魔王城へと 旅立ち\n バルディスタ要塞が 手薄になった\n:
Valeria's departure to the Great Demon King's Castle left Fortress Valdista short-handed, and as if to take advantage of the
opportunity...

256016.<center>女の魔王は どこだ？\n隠すならば 容赦はせぬぞ……:
Where is the lady Demon King? If you hide
her from me, I'll show you no mercy.

256020.「謎のフードの集団は バルディスタ軍の\n 精鋭たちを 片っぱしから なぎはらい:
The mysterious group of hooded folks easily
swept away Valdista's elite guard, and made
their way straight to the throne room.

256021.<center>この国の魔王は どこだ\nあやつの首を 取るまでは\nこの城から:
Where is the Demon King of this land? We are
not leaving without their head...

256022.<center>血には血を 命には命を\n貴様らの主君の 居場所を 白状しろ……:
Blood for blood, life for life, tell us the
whereabouts of your lord... do this, and we
will let your soldiers go...!

256023.「ヴァレリアが 滅ぼした国は 数知れず。\n おそらく 謎のフードの集団も\n:
Countless countries have been destroyed by
Valeria. I figured these hooded people were
probably the last remnants of one such group.

256024.「連中が 誰かの仇討ちのために来たのは\n 明らかだが……さて どうする？:
It's obvious they're here to avenge someone's
death, but... now what?

256025.「……鬼神のごとき強さの剣士が 率いるは\n それぞれ 並みならぬ 魔法の使い手:
...A swordsman with godly strength leading three extraordinary magic users, each with their own unique magic. Unfortunately, they're
way more than my skill can handle.

256026.「俺ひとりなら 生き延びられるかもしれんが\n 他の連中は みな殺しにされちまう:
I might be able to survive on my own, but all
the others will be killed. It's not a good
idea to fight here.

256027.「とすれば 答えは ひとつ！: Then there is only one answer!

256028.<center>答えよ……女の魔王は どこにいる？\nこれ以上 かばいだてするな:
Answer me... where is the lady Demon King? If
you cover for her any longer...

256029.「待て 無作法なる侵入者めが！\n そなたらが探す 魔王ヴァレリアならば\n こ:
Wait, you rude intruder! If it's Demon King
Valeria you seek, she's not here!

256031.「魔王ヴァレリアは 大魔王城にあり！\n さあ 教えてやったぞ！\n 約束通り:
The Great Demon King Valeria is in the castle
of the Great Demon King! There, I've told you!
Now leave Valdista as you promised!

256032.<center>大魔王城だな\n……その言葉 いつわりは ないだろうな:
The Great Demon King's Castle... you had
better not be lying.

256033.「……てなわけで 謎のフードの集団は\n はるか 大魔王様の城を 目指すため\n:
And so, the mysterious group of hooded people
left Valdista for the far-off Great Demon
King's Castle.

256034.「ま 多少の脚色は 加えたけどな。: Well, I did embellish a little.

256035.「お探しのフードの集団なら\n いずれ 大魔王城へ 現れるはずだぜ。\n あんた:
The group of hoods you're looking for should show up at the Great Demon King's castle sooner or later. With all of you there, I'm
it'll all work out.

256036.「ヴァレリアの敵は アンタの敵！\n それが 大魔王の責任って モンだろ？\n:
Valeria's enemies are your enemies! That's the
Great Demon King's responsibility, isn't it?
I'll leave the rest to you, Great Demon King!

256037.「大魔王城の みんな 大丈夫かな……？\n 急いで お城まで 帰りましょう。:
I wonder if everyone in the Great Demon King's
castle is all right...? Let's hurry back to
the castle.

256041.「これは いち大事で ございますぞ！\n 大魔王さま！\n すぐさま 迎撃の ご:
This is an important matter! Great Demon King!
Prepare to intercept at once!

256042.「うわさの フードの集団が\n お出ましのようだな。:
Looks like the rumored hood gang is about to
make their entrance.

256043.「ベルトロから 報告は受けている。\n 敵の目的は この私らしいな。\n 貴様ら:
Bertro has already informed me. It seems the
enemy's objective is me. You guys better stay
out of this!

256044.「君の強さを 知らないわけじゃないが……\n 万が一ということも あるからね。:
Not that I don't know how strong you are...
but just in case.

256045.「ここは 我等に！\n 大魔王は 大魔王らしく\n 玉座に 悠々と 座していてい:
This is for us to deal with! Let the Great
Demon King sit on their throne as they should!

256047.「僕の結界を こんなに あっさりと……！？: You broke my barrier so easily...!?

256049.「大魔王城を 血で汚すことは\n 気が進まぬが 仕方あるまい……。:
I don't like the idea of staining the Great
Demon King's castle with blood, but it can't
be helped...

256051.「僕は……\n わからない……覚えてない……。: I... don't know... I don't remember...

256053.「よかっ…た……。\n 僕……君に……会うため……\n ここまで…………:
I'm... glad... that I... came all this way...
to see you.

256055.「イルーシャと そっくりだと？\n いったい どうなってるんだ……。:
He looks just like Irusha! What the hell's
going on here...?

256056.「とにかく 医務室へ！\n 誰か！ この者を 医務室まで運んでくれ！:
Anyway, call a doctor! Somebody! Get this man
to the doctor's office!

256057.「さきほどの者は\n ひとまず 医務室で 寝かしてあります。:
The young man from before is sleeping in the
doctor's office for the time being.

256058.「イルーシャさまと うりふたつの姿とは\n どうも 気になりますな。\n いった:
Seeing someone who looks just like Irusha has
me curious. Who in the world is he?

256059.「そうそう 大魔王さま。\n あの 人間の男が 気になるようでしたら\n 医務室:
Oh yes, Great Demon King. If you are worried
about that boy, why don't you go to the
doctor's office?

256060.「医務室は 城の東翼 ２階でございます。\n 謎の男の容態は 医者に おたずねく:
The doctor's office is in the east wing of the castle, on the second floor. Please ask the doctor how our mysterious youth is faring.
Now then, Great Demon King, if you'll excuse me.

256062.「この城まで 生きて たどり着いただけでも\n 奇跡のようなものじゃな。:
It's a miracle that he made it to this castle
alive.

256063.「この人……助かりますか？: This person... can you help him?

256064.「わからん。\n 本人の 生きる意志が強ければ\n やがて回復し 目を覚ますじゃ:
I don't know. If his will to live is strong
enough, he will eventually recover and wake
up...

256065.「初めて会う人のはず……\n なのに どこか 懐かしい気持ちになるの。:
I feel nostalgic somehow, even though I'm
meeting him for the first time.

256066.「お願い 目を覚まして……。\n あなたと 話がしてみたい……。: Please, wake up... I want to talk to you...

256068.「なっ 何をしたんじゃ！？\n これっ ケガ人から 離れなさい！: What did you do? Here, step away from him!

256069.「ふむ……異常は ないようじゃな。\n しかし 今の光は いったい……？:
Hmm... there seems to be nothing wrong. But
what was that light?

256070.「とにかく 今は 絶対安静じゃ。\n よいか みなの者。\n めったなことは す:
Anyway, for now, he's on bed rest. Got it, you
two? Don't do anything unnecessary!

256071.「静かにしているなら\n この部屋に いてもいい……？:
Can I stay in this room as long as I'm
quiet...?

256073.「こやつが 目を覚ますか\n ……はたまた 息を 引き取るかしたら\n すぐに:
I'll let you know as soon as he wakes up... or
if he draws his last breath.

256074.「大魔王。アンタは 忙しい身じゃ。\n ケガ人のことは\n ワシらに まかせてお:
Great Demon King. I'm sure you are busy. Leave
the injured to me.

256075.「カーロウのヤツにも\n そう 伝えておいてくだされ。: Please relay the news to Carlow.

256076.「私が ちゃんと 看病するから\n 心配しないでね……。: I'll take good care of him, so don't worry...

256077.「……あいつが 大魔王どのと ベルトロが\n 魔界解放軍から 救ったという\n:
...So that was the human named Narasia that
the Great Demon King and Bertro saved from the
Demon World Liberation Army?

256078.「ただの人間が 丸腰で\n 魔界を 横断してきただと……？:
A mere human crossed into the Demon World
completely unarmed...?

256080.「城の外にほどこされた 外敵除けの結界も\n 僕の封印魔法も あいつには 通用し:
Neither the wards outside the castle to keep out trespassers, nor my sealing magic worked on him. I find it hard to believe that he's an
ordinary human.

256081.「……イルーシャ うりふたつの容貌に加え\n 彼女に 会うためだけに やってきた:
...A mysterious boy who not only looks like
Irusha, but came all the way out here just to
meet her...

256082.「謎のフードの集団と 関係がないとも限らん。\n あやつが 目を覚ましたら\n:
It may have something to do with the hooded
hooded group. If he wakes up, we'll have to
interrogate him thoroughly.

256084.「おお！ 待ちわびておったぞ！\n ささ こちらに……:
Oh! We've been waiting for you! Come, this
way...

256085.「なんと 見事な……。\n 新たなる大魔王に ふさわしい逸品だ。:
How splendid... a weapon worthy of the new
Great Demon King.

256086.「なあ。せっかく 鎌が 届いたんだ。\n 大魔王の装備を\n ひと通り 身につけ:
Hey. Since the scythe's here, why don't you
try it on with the Great Demon King's outfit?<yesno><close>

256087.「そんなこと 言わずに。\n 君の 大魔王としての正装を\n 僕たちに 見せてお:
Don't say that. Let's see your full ensemble
as the Great Demon King, huh?<yesno><close>

256089.「じゃあ さっそく 着替えてみろ……\n じゃない。\n お着替えください。大魔:
Then get dressed right away... I mean, please
get changed, Great Demon King.

256090.<pc>は\n大魔王の武器と装備を 身につけた！:
<pc> equipped the
Great Demon King's weapon and armor!

256091.「すごいや……見違えたよ！\n どこからどう見たって 大魔王だ。\n ちょっと:
Wow... look at you! No matter how you look at
it, you're the Great Demon King. Hold up that
scythe for a second!

256092.「ほほう。なかなかの闘気を 放つ。\n 改めて 手合わせしてみたいものだな。:
Oho. They're certainly giving off a fighting
spirit. It makes me want to spar with them
again.

256093.「次は 玉座に座ってみろよ！\n ほらほら 遠慮するなって。:
Next, try sitting on the throne! Come on, now,
don't be shy.

256094.「……バルディスタに 攻め入ったのは\n 貴様らだな？\n おおかた 仇討ちの:
...You were the ones who invaded Valdista,
weren't you? Most likely for some sort of
revenge.

256095.「大魔王城まで のこのこ やって来た\n その蛮勇を 讃え\n 私が じきじきに:
In recognition of your courage in making your
way to the Great Demon King's castle, I will
gladly be your opponent.

256096.「……長い 道のりでした。: ...It was a long road to get here.

256097.「命を 賭した 修行の日々も\n 魔界の深奥への つらく 厳しい旅も\n すべて:
All the days of training, risking my life, all
the hardships of my journey into the depths of
the Demon World... all for this moment...

256098.「魔界を滅ぼし 大魔王を倒す。\n ……それこそが 勇者の使命！:
To destroy the Demon World, and defeat the
Great Demon King... that is a Hero's mission!

256099.「我が名は グランゼドーラ 第一王女にして\n 当代の勇者 アンルシア！:
I am Anlucia! First princess and the Hero of
the Kingdom of Gran Zedora!

256100.「太古より続く アストルティアへの侵攻と\n 非道なる 破壊と 殺りくの数々……:
The invasion of Astoltia since time immemorial
and the atrocious destruction and murder of
our people cannot be tolerated any longer!

256101.「決着をつけましょう 魔王ヴァレリア。\n そして……: Let's settle this, Demon King Valeria. And...

256102.「災いの根源……大魔王！！: The root of all evil... the Great Demon King!!

256103.「誰かと思えば……\n あの時の アストルティアの小娘か。:
I thought I recognized you... the little girl
from Astoltia.

256104.「大魔王に 出ていただくまでもない。\n 私に まかせてもらおう！:
The Great Demon King doesn't need to lift a
finger. I will deal with you myself!

256107.「……代々の勇者と 盟友たちよ。\n どうか 私にチカラを。:
...Heroes and allies of the past. Please give
me strength!

256108.「ずいぶん 剣技に 自信があるようだね。\n でも……これは どうかな？:
You seem to have a lot of confidence in your
swordsmanship. But...what about this?

256110.「故郷を滅ぼされ 同胞の命を奪われた\n 怒りと絶望……\n とくと 思い知って:
The anger and despair of having your homeland
destroyed and the lives of your people taken
from you... you will know what it is like.

256111.「勇者……ッ！\n まさか これほどまでとは……！？:
The Hero...! I didn't think they'd be this
strong...!

256113.「アストルティアの悲しみの歴史に\n 今こそ 私が 終止符を打つ！:
Now is the time for me to put an end to
Astoltia's tragic history!

256114.「大魔王……いざ 勝負っ！！: Great Demon King... I challenge you!!

256115.勇者姫アンルシアと 戦いますか？<yesno><close>: Would you like to fight Hero Princess Anlucia?<yesno><close>

256116.「まさか 怖気づいたと いうのですか？\n もう 逃げ場は ありません。\n 大:
You don't mean to tell me that you've become
frightened? There is no escape now. Great
Demon King! Fight me now!

256117.本当に 勇者姫アンルシアと 戦いますか？<yesno><close>:
Do you really want to fight Hero Princess
Anlucia?<yesno><close>

256126.正体が明らかになった <pc>は\nアンルシアたちに 休戦を 申し出ると\n大魔:
When 's true identity was revealed, they offered Anlucia and others a truce and led them to the Great Demon King
Castle's meeting room.

256127.そして 一度は 命を落としかけたものの\nユシュカの魔力によって 救われたこと…:
<pc> explained to Anlucia and the
others about how they almost lost their life,
how they were saved by Yushka...

256128.来たる 大魔瘴期から 世界を救うため\n大魔王に即位したことを\nアンルシアたち:
And how they ascended the throne as the Great
Demon King to save the world from the coming
Age of Miasma...

256129.「……あなたが そこにいる 魔王ユシュカに\n 命を救われた恩を 感じているのは:
I understand that you feel a debt of gratitude
to Demon King Yushka for saving your life.

256130.「でも……これまで 魔王たちが\n アストルティアに何をしたのか 忘れたの？\n:
But... have you forgotten what the Demon Kings
have done to Astoltia? And you're taking the
Demon World's side?

256131.「大魔王が救うのは 魔界だけじゃない。\n アンタらが住む アストルティアもだ。:
The Great Demon King will not only save the
Demon World, but also Astoltia, where you
live.

256132.「大魔瘴期の到来は 予想以上に早く\n その影響は 魔界だけでは 済まない。:
The Age of Miasma is coming earlier than
expected, and its effects will not be limited
to just the Demon World.

256133.「ふたつの世界は 光の河をへだてて\n つながっている。魔界を滅ぼした魔瘴は\n:
The two worlds are connected by a river of light. The demon miasma that will destroy the Demon World will surely pour over Astoltia as
well.

256134.「もはや 魔界の民とアストルティアの民が\n 戦っている場合では ないんだ。:
This is no longer the time for the people of
the Demon World and Astoltia to be fighting.

256135.「これまでの恨みは忘れ 休戦してほしい。\n ともに 大魔瘴期に 立ち向かおう！:
I hope you will forget your past grudges and
make a truce. Together, we must face the Age
of Miasma!

256136.「立ち向かう……と おっしゃいますが\n 何か 策があるのですか？:
You say to face it... but do you have a plan
for that?

256137.「そこにいる 魔瘴の巫女イルーシャは\n 魔瘴を鎮めるチカラを 持っている。\n:
The Maiden of Miasma there, Irusha, has the
power to quell demon miasma. First, the Maiden
will delay the onset of the Age of Miasma.

256138.「その間に 協力して 元凶を突き止めよう。\n たがいに 知恵を出し合えば\n:
In the meantime, let's work together to find the source of the problem. If we pool our resources, we can find a way to stop the Age
of Miasma!

256139.「魔瘴の巫女だと……？\n その娘に そんなチカラが？:
A Maiden of Miasma...? She has that kind of
power?

256140.「……私たちの故郷 エテーネの村は\n あなたがた 魔族によって 滅ぼされました:
...Our home village of Ethene Village was
destroyed by your demons.

256141.「唐突に 大魔瘴期だの\n 魔瘴の巫女だのと 言われても\n おいそれと 信用は:
And now you suddenly tell me about some Age of
Miasma or Maiden of Miasma... I can't believe
your words.

256142.「……正直なところ あなたがたを前にして\n こうして 冷静に対話することだけで:
To be honest, it's taking everything I have to
be able to just sit here and listen calmly.

256143.「盟友である あなたのことは 信じてるわ。\n けれど そんな簡単に\n すべて:
I believe in you, my ally. But if you're
asking me to let bygones be bygones...

256144.「……フン。勝手なことを。\n 同胞を失った 恨みならば 魔界も同じだ。:
...Hmph. How selfish. If it's resentment for
the loss of your brethren, the Demon World is
no different.

256147.「デモンマウンテン……？\n まさか……魔仙卿の しわざか？:
Demon Mountain...? Don't tell me... that was
the Oracle's play?

256148.「……アストルティアの勇者よ。\n 大魔瘴期の到来が うそじゃないって事を\n:
Hero of Astoltia. Are you willing to confirm
with your own eyes that the Age of Miasma is
not a lie?

256149.「このまま 手をこまねいてたら どうなるか \n ジャディンの園に行けば わかる:
If you go to Jyadain Garden, you'll see what
happens if we don't do something about it.
Come with us.

256150.「私が 魔瘴を 鎮められるところ……\n 見てもらいたいの。\n 一緒に デモン:
I want you to see that I can subdue the demon
miasma. Shall we go to Demon Mountain
together?

256151.「魔瘴があふれるような 危険な状況へ\n 魔界の住人ならざる私たちが\n 出向く:
It's too dangerous for us, who are not of the
Demon World, to go to such a situation where
demon miasma is overflowing.

256152.「魔瘴の巫女のチカラを 見定めるなら\n 例えば アストルティアに出現した魔瘴で:
If we want to determine the power of Maiden of Miasma, for example, we can use the demon miasma that appeared in Astoltia to confirm
it.

256153.「やれやれ……。\n わかっちゃいるが 信用がねえなあ。:
Good grief... I get it, I get it. You don't
trust us.

256154.「……では 魔界と アストルティアから\n 双方の代表者が 同数ずつ\n 出発す:
...Then how about this? An equal number of
representatives from the Demon World and
Astoltia will depart.

256155.「魔界側の代表者は 私が選びます。\n この条件で いいというなら\n ジャディ:
I will choose the representatives from the
Demon World. If you agree to these conditions,
we will go with you to Jyadain Garden.

256156.「……まあ いいだろう。\n それで 気が 済むってんならな。:
...Well, that's fine. If it makes you feel
better.

256157.「アストルティアからは\n 私と 賢者ルシェンダさまが。:
From Astoltia, I choose myself and Sage
Lushenda.

256158.「魔界からは 魔王ユシュカと\n 魔瘴の巫女イルーシャさんに お願いします。:
From the Demon World, I choose Demon King
Yushka and the Maiden of Miasma, Irusha.

256160.「あなたにも 来てほしいの。\n 魔界と アストルティア\n それぞれを 知る者:
I want you to come too. As someone who knows
both the Demon World and Astoltia...

256162.「魔仙卿ってヤツが 何者なのか\n くわしい話は 道中 説明しよう。:
I'll explain the details of who the Oracle is
on the way.

256163.「……では\n デモンマウンテンの頂上へ 出発しよう！: Let's go to the top of Demon Mountain!

256165.「モモリオン王！ みんな！？\n お願い。返事をして……！:
Sanguini King Peach! Everyone! Please. Answer
me...!

256166.「……マ…マドモアゼル……？\n 逃げたほうが…いいの…だわ……。: M... mademoiselle...? You need... to... run...

256167.「しっかりして！\n すぐに 私が 魔瘴を消すから！:
Stay with me! I'll get rid of the demon miasma
right away!

256169.「くそっ……！\n 予想以上に ひどいぜ……。: Damn...! This is even worse than I thought.

256171.「やっぱり あいつの しわざなんだな。\n みんな！ 追いかけるぞ……:
I should've known this was their doing.
Everyone! We need to go after them...

256172.「くっ……。いまいましい 魔瘴め……！\n このままじゃ やられちまう！:
Damn demon miasma...! We're going to die at
this rate!

256174.「だめ……負けるわけには……。\n みんなを 助けなきゃ……！:
No... I can't lose... I have to save
everyone...!

256177.「どうしても この場所に\n 来なければならない 気がして……。\n そしたら:
I felt like I had to come to this place... and
then I met you.

256179.「はぁ はぁ……。\n これじゃ キリがないわ……！: Hah... hah... there's no end to it...!

256180.「あいつ……\n イルーシャと 同じチカラを？: He... he has the same power as Irusha?

256181.「あれが……\n 魔瘴の巫女のチカラなのね……。:
That... must be the power of the Maiden of
Miasma...

256184.「仕方ない。\n とっておきを 使うか！: We have no choice. Let's use the special!

256185.「コイツでも くらいな！: Even this one is as good as it gets!

256188.「小僧だと？ 誰に向かって……: A kid? Who are you talking to...

256191.「今度は 勇者と盟友が お相手するわ！\n さあ かかってきなさい！:
This time, Hero and his allies will be your
opponents! Come and get it!

256192.「どうにか 魔瘴魂は\n 一掃できたようだが……ひどい有様だ。:
Somehow we managed to wipe out the Evil Souls,
but... it's a terrible mess.

256193.「……イルーシャさんたちが\n 魔瘴を 鎮めてくれなかったら\n みんな……死ん:
...If Irusha-san and the others hadn't subdued
the demon miasma, we would all be...dead.

256195.「しかし……ナラジアと いったか？\n お前も 魔瘴をあやつれたとはな。:
But...Narasia, you say? I didn't know you
could also master demon miasma.

256197.「やがて来る 大魔瘴期には\n さっきの 何万倍もの魔瘴が\n 魔界中を 覆い尽:
It is said that during the coming Age of
Miasma, tens of thousands of times more demon
miasma will cover the entire Demon World.

256198.「それを なんとかして 止めたいという\n 俺たちの願いに いつわりはない。:
There's no change in our desire to do
something to stop it.

256200.「ま ゆっくり 考えてくれ。\n さあて 本題に 戻るとするか！:
Take your time and think about it. Now, let's
get back to the main topic!

256202.「大いなる闇の根源へと 通じるという\n 秘められし場所……。:
A hidden place that leads to the source of the
great darkness...

256203.「おそらく 魔仙卿は 神殿のどこかに\n 潜んでいるはずだ。:
Perhaps Oracle is lurking somewhere in the
temple.

256204.「ならば その人を 見つけだして\n これ以上 みんなを 苦しめたりしないように:
Then let me be the one to tell you to find
that person and stop causing everyone else so
much pain!

256207.「よし！ 魔仙卿を 追いかけるぞ！\n ゴダ神殿へ 向かおう！:
All right! Let's go after Oracle! Let's go to
Goda Temple!

256208.「気をつけろ。\n どこに 魔仙卿が 潜んでいるか\n わからないからな。:
Be careful. You never know where Oracle might
be lurking.

256210.「私は……ここから この世界に現れたの。: I...came into this world from here.

256213.「わからない……。\n けれど この先にいる 誰かが\n 僕のことを 呼ぶ声が聞:
I don't know... but I can hear someone up
ahead calling out to me...

256214.「僕が……僕たちが\n この世界にやってきた意味は この先に……。:
The reason I... the reason we came to this
world... is because of what lies ahead...

256216.「この下に……いる。\n 封印された神殿の奥に……。:
Down here... they are. Deep within the sealed
temple...

256217.「……ゴダ神殿の 真の役目は\n 大いなる闇の根源を 封印すること。:
...the true function of the Goda Temple is to
seal the great source of darkness.

256218.「大いなる闇の根源と 呼ばれしもの。\n その まことの名は……:
He is called the source of the great darkness.
Its true name is...

256221.「もしや 魔仙卿とやらの 狙いは\n ジャゴヌバの復活なのか！？:
If Oracle and his ilk are after Jagonuba's
resurrection!

256222.「……行きましょう ジャゴヌバの神殿へ。\n そこで……すべてが わかるはず。:
Let's go to the Jagonuba Temple. There... you
will find everything.

256223.「この扉……\n 何者かの術によって 閉ざされているようだ。:
This door...seems to have been closed by
someone's magic.

256224.「魔仙卿のしわざ かもしれん。\n 俺たちの行く手を 阻むために……:
Maybe it's the work of Oracle. He's trying to
block our way.

256225.「……いいえ。\n この扉に ほどこされた 封印は\n 中にいる者から 世界を守:
No. The seal on this door was placed to
protect the world from those within.

256227.「ええ……。\n ジャゴヌバは この奥に。: Yes... Jagonuba is in the back here.

256228.「待って！ どうして 扉を開くの！？\n ジャゴヌバを 封印しておかなくては\n:
Wait! Why are you opening the door? We have to
keep Jagonuba sealed up, don't we!

256229.「ええ。かの 異界滅神ジャゴヌバを\n 外界へ 出さぬようにすることが\n この:
Yes. The function of this temple is to keep
the Eldritch God Jagonuba out of the world.

256230.「されど 時の流れが 封印を弱め\n ジャゴヌバは 覚醒しようとしている。:
Yet time has weakened the seal, and Jagonuba
is about to awaken.

256231.「ジャディンの園を滅ぼせし 魔瘴も\n 魔界に訪れんとする 大魔瘴期も……\n:
The demon miasma that destroyed the Jyadain Garden and the Age of Miasma that is coming to Demon World... all of them are the result of
that Waking Dead.

256232.「だから 私たちは\n この世界に 現れた……。: That's why we came into this world...

256233.「お前たち……まさか\n ジャゴヌバを 再び 封印するために……？:
You guys... you didn't do this to seal up
Jagonuba again, did you?

256234.「さあ……。\n 封印されし ジャゴヌバは この先に。: Now... the sealed Jagonuba lies ahead.

256235.「こうして 扉の前に いるだけで\n ヤバいことが 起こる予感が\n ビンビンし:
Just being in front of the door like this, I
have a strong feeling that something bad is
about to happen.

256236.「だが 魔仙卿の企みを 止めるためには\n 先に進むしかない。:
But in order to stop what Oracle is up to, we
must move on.

256237.「この先は 何が起きるか わからない。\n 覚悟を決めて 進もう。:
We don't know what will happen next. Let's be
prepared and keep going.

256240.「わかるわ……。\n あれは これまで 戦ってきた\n どんな敵よりも 邪悪な存:
I know... it's more evil than any enemy I've
ever fought.

256242.「……やはり 貴様の仕業か！\n 魔仙卿！: I knew it was you! Oracle!

256244.「……大魔王と 話がある。\n 他の者は 下がっていろ。:
I need to speak with the Great Demon King. The
rest of you stay back.

256245.「待って！ ひとりでは 危険よ！: Wait! It's not safe to go alone!

256251.「コイツが 異界滅神ジャゴヌバ。\n 今は まだ 眠っているけど。:
This is Eldritch God Jagonuba. He's still
sleeping right now.

256252.「ジャディンの園を滅ぼした 魔瘴の噴出は\n ジャゴヌバ復活が 近づいたせいらし:
It seems that the eruption of the demon miasma that destroyed the Jyadain Garden is due to the approaching resurrection of Jagonuba. But
why so soon?

256253.「魔王ユシュカは おいらのせいだと\n 誤解しているみたいだね。\n 大魔王の戴:
Demon King Yushka seems to have misunderstood
that it was my fault. Maybe I scared him too
much at the Great Demon King's coronation.

256254.「おいらは 長い間 魔仙卿を演じ\n アストルティアと魔界が\n 共存する道を:
I've been playing the role of Oracle for a
long time, trying to find a way for Astoltia
and Demon World to coexist...

256255.「けれど 魔界の 地上への怨念は根深く\n 地上もまた 魔界を許せはしない。\n:
But the Demon World's grudge against the earth is deep-rooted, and the earth cannot forgive the Demon World either. Peace could not be
achieved by the usual methods.

256256.「ふたつの世界が 全面的に争いを始めた後\n 大魔瘴期が訪れたら……もう 手の施:
If the Age of Miasma comes after the two
worlds start a full-scale conflict... it will
be out of our control. That's why I...

256257.「封印されし 異界滅神ジャゴヌバに働きかけて\n 大魔瘴期を早め……両世界が 協:
I tried to work with the sealed Eldritch God Jagonuba to hasten the Age of Miasma... to bring about a situation where both worlds
would have no choice but to cooperate.

256258.「戴冠式で あんな芝居をしたのも まず\n 魔界３国の絆を 深めるためだったんだ:
The reason I put on that act at the coronation was to strengthen the bond between the three Demon World countries. I'm sorry for being so
rough with you.

256259.「姉ちゃんが 魔界を平定し\n 新たな大魔王に 即位した あのとき……\n おい:
When my sister conquered Demon World and ascended to the throne as the new Great Demon King, I was convinced that our plan had
succeeded.

256260.「勇者の盟友であり 大魔王である\n 姉ちゃんだからこそ\n ふたつの世界の か:
Because you are Hero's ally and Great Demon
King, you can be the bridge between the two
worlds.

256261.「お願いだよ 姉ちゃん。\n どうか アストルティアと 魔界\n ふたつの世界を:
Please, sis. Please unite Astoltia and the two
Demon Worlds.

256262.「同じ危機に 協力して 立ち向かえば\n 魔界の３国が まとまったように\n ア:
If we work together to face the same crisis,
we can unite Astoltia as the three nations of
Demon World have united!

256263.「時獄の迷宮で 最後に会ったとき\n おいらと 約束しただろ？\n 何があっても:
When we last met in the Time Prison, didn't
you promise me? That you would protect
Astoltia no matter what.

256264.「おいらたちの アストルティア……\n 魔界と 地上の すべてを\n ジャゴヌバ:
I want you to protect our Astoltia, the Demon
World, and everything on earth from the hands
of Jagonuba.

256265.「姉ちゃんなら きっと できるって\n ……おいら 信じてるよ。: I believe you will be able to do it.

256266.「そうだ。おいらが 裏で糸を引いてたって\n 知られたら すべてが 台無しだ。\:
That's right. If they find out that I've been pulling strings behind the scenes, everything will be ruined. What I just told you is a
secret between us.

256267.「……しかし おかしいのだ。\n 我が計算では このタイミングで\n ここまで:
But it's not right. According to my
calculations, the seal should not have been
loosened this far at this time.

256268.「だが 心配は無用。こいつとの付き合いは長い。\n 元通り 抑えることは たやす:
But don't worry. I've known this guy for a
long time. It will be easy to get him back
under control. You will take them to safety.

256271.「あいつ……魔仙卿に\n 何も されなかっただろうな？: He... he didn't do anything to Oracle, did he?

256272.「おいっ お前たち！\n そいつは危険だ！ もどれ！！: Hey, guys! That's dangerous! Get back!

Astoltia will be destroyed by the Age of
Miasma.

256424.「……アンルシア姫。\n あなたの考えを はっきり お聞かせください。:
Princess Anlucia. Let me ask you to speak your
mind.

256425.「……魔界と 手を結びましょう。: Let's join hands with Demon World.

256426.「……賢者マリーンによれば ジャゴヌバを\n 倒すことが できるのは\n 等しき:
According to Sage Malynn, only a god with
equal power can defeat Jagonuba.

256427.「……光の神 ルティアナの復活なしに\n 我々に 勝ち目はないとのことだ。:
...that we do not stand a chance without the
return of Lutiana, the God of Light.

256429.「竜族の神 ナドラガをはじめ\n 七柱の種族神を 生みだしたという\n 母なる:
The mother goddess of creation who gave birth
to the dragon god Nadraga and seven other
species?

256430.「ええ……。\n 賢者マリーンさまが おっしゃったように\n ルティアナさまを:
Yes... as Sage Malynn said, we will resurrect
Lutiana.

256431.「魔界と アストルティア そのすべてが\n 滅びる前に 魔界と 手を取り合い\n:
Demon World and Astoltia, before they all
perish, must join hands with Demon World to
face Jagonuba!

256432.「……ですが そう簡単に\n アストルティアの人々が\n 納得するとは 思えませ:
But I don't think the people of Astoltia will
be so easily convinced.

256433.「だからこそ 我々は\n いったん アストルティアに戻ろうと思う。:
That's why we're going back to Astoltia once
we're there.

256434.「我々が 見たものを ありのままに伝え\n ……できる限り 皆を 説得しなくては:
We have to tell it like it is, what we saw...
and convince people as best we can.

256435.「でなければ どちらの世界にも\n 未来は ないのだ……。:
Otherwise, there is no future for either
world...

256436.「……わかりました。\n 勇者と盟友の決断を 信じましょう。:
I understand. Let us trust the decision of
Hero and his allies.

256437.「世界から切り離された 魔界の在り様は\n ナドラガンドの 合わせ鏡……。:
The state of the Demon World, cut off from the
rest of the world, is a mirror to Nadragand...

256438.「見捨てられた 魔界側から\n 手を 差し伸べてくれたのです。\n 握り返すべき:
They have reached out to us from the forsaken
Demon World side. I guess I should grab it
back.

256439.「きっと いい報せを 持って帰るわ。\n それまでの間\n 魔界のことは お願い:
I'm sure I'll return with good news. Until
then, please take care of Demon World for me.

256442.「アストルティアの連中のチカラなど\n 借りずとも 我々だけで……:
We don't need any help from the people of
Astoltia, we can do this on our own.

256443.「君を あっさり 打ち負かした\n 勇者姫アンルシアですら\n ジャゴヌバには:
Even Hero Princess Anlucia, who defeated you
so easily, was no match for Jagonuba.

256444.「アストルティアと 手を組み ともに\n ジャゴヌバに立ち向かおうって\n 大魔:
Let's follow the Great Demon King's policy of
joining hands with Astoltia and together stand
against Jagonuba. Right?

256445.「……ここまで 話が まとまったのも\n お前が 大魔王だった おかげだ。\n:
...The reason we've been able to come to this
point is because you were the Great Demon
King. I'm grateful.

256446.「うむ うむ！\n すべては 大魔王さまの偉大さゆえで\n ございますな！:
Mm-mm-mm! All because of the Great Demon
King's greatness!

256447.「そうそう 大魔王さま。\n これは ここにいる みなからの\n 感謝のしるしで:
Yes, yes, Great Demon King. This is a token of
gratitude from everyone here.

256448.「このたびは お疲れさまでございました。\n アストルティアから 報せが届くまで:
Thank you for your hard work. Until news
arrives from Astoltia, please make yourself at
home.

256822.「そうだ。オレが 裏で糸を引いてたって\n 知られたら すべてが 台無しになる。:
That's right. If they find out that I'm behind
all this, it'll ruin everything. What I just
told you is a secret between us.

256823.<pipipi_mid>「そうそう。あたしが 裏で糸を引いてたって\n 知られた:
Yes, yes. If they find out that I've been pulling strings behind the scenes, everything will be ruined. What I just told
you is a secret between us.

256824.<pipipi_mid>「そうだ。私が 裏で糸を引いてたって\n 知られたら ぜ:
Yes. If they knew I was pulling strings behind the scenes, everything would be ruined. What I just told you is a secret
between us.

258033.「バルディスタ領の辺境……\n アストルティアへと続く 大洞穴付近に\n 突然:
Dark Hill has suddenly appeared near a large
cave that leads to Astoltia, on the border of
Valdista territory!

258034.「魔瘴塚からは 膨大な魔瘴が 噴出しており\n 近隣の 遠征軍駐屯所の兵たちが\:
Dark Hill is spewing out an enormous amount of
demon miasma, and soldiers from the nearby
Expedition Station are calling for help!

258035.「恐れながら 大魔王様に 申し上げます！: I humbly submit to you, Great Demon King!

258036.「何者かが 大魔王城の外に ほどこした\n 外敵除けの結界を破り 城に接近中です:
Someone has broken through the barrier we've placed outside Great Demon King's castle and is approaching the castle! It won't be long
before they reach the main gate...

258037.「すでに 魔王様がたには ご連絡いたしました。\n 大魔王様も 襲撃に お備えく:
We have already contacted the Demon Kings.
Great Demon King, please prepare for the
attack!

258038.「ご報告いたします！\n 陛下の 新しい武器……\n 大魔王の鎌が 完成いたしま:
I have something to report! Your Majesty's new
weapon the Demon King Scythe has been
completed!

258040.「デモンマウンテンに 異変が起きました！\n 大量の魔瘴が噴出し\n 山頂を 覆:
Something's happened to Demon Mountain! A
massive amount of demon miasma has erupted,
covering the Summit!

258041.「……古き友より 預かったコイツを\n 使うべき時が 来たようだな。:
I think it's time to use this, entrusted to me
by an old friend.

259240.「ナラジア あなたは……\n いいえ 私たちは 何者なの……？: Narasia, are you... no, are we...?

259241.「アストルティアを 救うため\n 私は……魔族と 手を結ぶつもりです。:
In order to save Astoltia... I intend to join
forces with the demons.

259242.「勇者アルヴァンさま……\n トーマ兄さま どうか お許しを……。: Hero Alvan... Toma... please forgive me...

259243.「本当に怖いのは ここからだよ♪: Here's where it gets really scary... ♪

259476.「ああ……。俺も この目で ジャゴヌバを見て\n はっきりと 理解した。\n ヤ:
Yeah... I saw Jagonuba with my own eyes and
I could tell right away. If we don't defeat
him, we have no future.

260085.デモンマウンテンに噴出した 魔瘴によって\nゴダ神殿に置かれた アビスゲートは\:
The Abyss Gate in Goda Temple seems to have
been closed by the demon miasma that erupted
in Demon Mountain.

260086.魔瘴が 鎮まったため\nゴダ神殿のアビスゲートが 開かれたようだ。:
The Abyss Gate in Goda Temple seems to have
been opened now that the miasma has subsided.

263240.「謎のフードの集団 襲来！ ……かと 思いきや\n とんだ 肩すかしで ございま:
A mysterious group of hoods attacked! I thought they were going to attack us... but I was disappointed to find out that they did
not. Anyway, we will continue to be vigilant.

263241.「……やってくれたな。\n 面白い。それでこそ 勇者よ……！:
...You've really done it, now. Interesting. I
guess that's why you're the Hero...!

263242.「アンルシア姫！\n ここは 私たちにまかせて 大魔王のもとへ！:
Princess Anlucia! Leave this to us and go
after the Great Demon King!

263247.「でも……\n どうして あなたが 大魔王なの……？: But... why are you the Great Demon King...?

263249.賢者マリーンに その場をまかせ\n<pc>たちは\n大魔王城へと 帰還した……。:
Leaving Sage Malynn in charge, the
<pc> and the others returned to Great
Demon King's castle...

263250.ドクター・ムーの 治療によって\nイルーシャは すぐに回復したが\nナラジアは:
Dr. Mu's treatment helped Irusha recover
quickly, but Narasia had not yet awakened...
